comments.text: Stood after the tool boths, got picked up quickly. Right beside me transport inspection was checking lorrys, but they did not care about me
Very good spot to go direction Wroclaw or Germany
Perfect spot, many cars, we (2men) declined offers to katowice and got a lift to Graz in Austria after 30 min.

I was standing before paytolls, some lorry took me to Katowice after 5 minutes

We waited for a very short time, even thought a lot of cars passed because they vere full of people or stuff (mainly going home from vacation because it was sunday evening). But really nice place to hitchhike especially when someone takes you to this place :).

nice place, a lot of cars going through

Many cars stopping there and going to Wroclaw and Germany, found our ride quickly
Stuck my thumb out before the exit and quickly got picked up

Many cars (passengers and trucks) stop here to fill the cars, to rest, eat - lots of choices. I was alone (a girl) and after asking a few drivers (it was at long weekend when most of big trucks can't drive) I found a small truck exactly to dresden when I was going on.
When going to Cracow from Wroclaw it's the last decent place to hitch, because you need to avoid Katowice. Next is tollbooth.
15 minutes with a sign "KRAK√ìW"

Good traffic on sunday. A couple german drivers (berlin). We got a ride after 30 minutes.

With some luck, you can catch a long ride. There were people driving to Ghent (Belgium), but their car was full. Other people where driving to Antwerp (Belgium), but they only wanted to take me to Berlin.
I got here in the evening. There was a guy offering me a ride to Hamburg, another a ride to Berlin, but I had to wait some time (about 1 hour).
good spot to wroclaw i krak√≥w
It's depends, but sometimes you must waiting there for 5 min, sometimes 30 min ;) To Opole, Wroc≈Çaw, to Krak√≥w it's also easy ;)

If You have questions please use the "Contact Me" section on my website www.claudioadrianodobre.com to get in touch with me. Hit the road hard ;)
3rd car stopped and took me to Wroclaw :)

Got a ride in couple of minutes towards Krakow. Fence gates were open to access station. 2 M
I believe most traffic is going to the Katowice area, but Krakow is not too hard either. As of august 2025 the hole is still there just before the woods that are close to the exit.

Arguably one of the best spots in Poland. Great to catch a ride towards Wroc≈Çaw or Katowice. With some luck you can also find a driver going to Kielce, Lublin, Rzesz√≥w or even Ukraine or Czech Republic.

As 1 imag

this is a very good spot to hitchhike in the direction of SZCZECIN (stettin) and BERLIN (germany). in summer 2009 there was an ongoing road construction work at this place so cars had to drive slow. also: if there are trains passing on the track crossing the road all cars have to stop. if you feel hungry - there is a MAKRO hypermarket next to this spot (not shown on this map). on my personal rating from 1 to 10 (1 = poor, 10 = excellent) this place i want to rate with a 9.
Moreover you are perfectly legal at this spot, because fromally it is not a freeway! Freeway starts few houndres meters after this point.

There is also a gas station a few meters to the north, but it only works when you wanna go south. When we came to the

good spot to get to Berlin
just behind the border gate. cars are riding slowly here and its easy to impress somebody. Anyway, there√Ç¬¥re some cars stopping so you can ask them.

Ok, I might be a little bit biased, but this is one of those spots in my heart. The whole Wojska Polskiego Road is nice; there are places to stop every couple of meters, and I think there is a bus stop as well. Perfect spot towards Ciechan√≥w, there is a bus stop just after the roundabout, good visibility, and slow traffic.

Towards Kielce, there's actually busses here that you can just walk in and get free to Kielce but if you want to go further you can stand here, the bus stops were full of people but cars turning from Brzeziny will most likely stop with 5-10 minutes of waiting, where you can control more where you wanna go than with the bus
Towards Morawica/Kielce, there's a small side on the road where cars can stop, not the comfiest but speeds are slow so you will probably get a car within 10-15 minutes

Good bus stop towards Polaniec, very good visiblity for cars, pretty wide for stopping also, wait time of 5 minutes
Same story, wide entrances for houses, good traffic with speeds not that high, for short rides to get out of Mielec this is a very good road, direction Gawluszowice, wait time of 5 minutes

Wide entrances to the houses, since there is traffic light before the speeds are low, quite some cars, good for going northbound and getting out of Mielec, ask for Gawluszowice, don't expect a long distance ride here tho, wait times of 5-10 minutes expected

Not much of a shoulder after the roundabout but the speeds are slow and you can catch a car going towards Tarnobrzeg within 10 minutes, just don't go too far away from the roundabout since they tend to speed up there quite fast

Towards Stalowa Wola, great spot, you can just hitchhike in Zaklikow, wide sidewalks and speeds are slow, long straight part with good visibility, nice amount of traffic and locals are friendly, wait time of 5 minutes to be expected

Excellent bus stop for going towards Lublin, nice big building where u can hitch in rain as the roof covers you pretty well, speeds are very low, a lot of traffic and most cars go to Lublin the least, expected wait time of 5 minutes here (side note: probably will be outdated once the new road S19 has been built but for now this is amazing spot)
Wide entrance to those buildings, direction Siemiatycze, decent traffic, after this the speeds go up and I wouldnt recommend walking any further, expected wait time of 5-20 minutes
Towards Siemiatycze, the houses here have wide entranceways, as well as the speeds are slow, expected wait time of 5-15 minutes

Towards Augustow, low traffic, but literally first cars pick you up around here, expected wait time of 5-15 minutes, barely any villages on the road so most likely you will get a direct ride to Augustow, if you go to LT direction avoid Gruszki road and still use this and hitch further from Augustow
To Lipsk, just after roundabout, low traffic but first car usually stops since basically everyone here goes to Lipsk, expected wait time of 5-15 minutes
Dirction Dabrowa Bialostocka, just after guardrails it is very good road for hitching, first or second car will stop, low traffic, but friendly people. Wait time of 5-15 minutes

Instead of going as far as other reviewers suggest you can just come by here, it has some entryroad on right to some parking that nobody uses and you can just stand before that to signal cars to turn over there, it's wide enough for them to stop, wait time of 5-15 minutes expected for the least Zabludow, but quite some cars go to Bielsk Podlaski all the way also

Towards Sejny/LT, good visibility, decent traffic, be aware that some cars use the road to go Lipsk road so stay a bit further towards Augustow on the side of the road, don't block anyone, wait time of 5-20 minutes
Good visibility if going south, nice walk from the lakes to here, wait time of 5-15 minutes

Nice spot for going out of Swinoujscie, got 3 offers within 15 minutes, a lot of locals, you could try to get with them past the newbuilt tunnel to the port roundabout, seemed like a very good spot also, but I just waited here for a longer ride, ( you could get a car to all the way to Gdansk and surely to Szczecin)

Dont know the exact spot on the road, we just walked down with a sign after getting out of our sleeping spot(I recommend ear plugs here you‚Äôll find out why). Got a ride almost immediatelly to Zgorzelec. 

If you come here take a look around the town, everything revolves around the huge power plant. Try to look local though, got kicked out by security when looking aroud. They thought we are green peace. They also made us delete our photos lol.

On the bus stop, good spot to catch a car to the center of Cieszyn, but no further. However, from Cieszyn you can go 30min by foot to another good spot.
We spend about 15min waiting here.
Good spot if you are going from Sulechow to Poznan. You can catch a lift earlier, but since they built a bypass, it is easier here.
Road 379 towards Swidnica/Wroc≈Çaw. Spot is just behind the pedestrian crossing.

Bus stop on crossing Pi≈Çsudskiego/11 Listopada. Road 381 towards K≈Çodzko. Nice spot close to the city centre, saves the walk to the crossing of 381/379, so also good for rides towards Swidnica/Wroc≈Çaw.
Road 35 from ≈öwiebodzice to Wa≈Çbrzych. Spot is on road 34, just after the bend there's a wide shoulder for cars to stop, after they are already in the right lane for Wa≈Çbrzych.
Road 34 towards Wa≈Çbrzych. Spot at the crossing with road 5. Just behind the crossing there's some place for cars to stop.
Bolk√≥w, crossing on road 5 towards Strzegom / Wroc≈Çaw. Stand at the traffic sign, cars can be a bit fast but the spot is good.
Bus stop in Nowa Wies Legnicka on road 3 direction south (Jawor/CZ). Traffic has to slow down here in the village.

Pretty much all cars passing through Koszalin go past this bus stop, are moving pretty slowly after the roundabout, and can stop at the bus stop. Not ideal for getting out of Koszalin, but pretty good if you got dropped off near the edge like we did.
Very good spot for Poznan. there is enough space for car to stop and they are driving slow because of crossroad before.

Pretty good hitching location, got a ride within 30 minutes towards Gdansk. Do not expect to get there in one go, unless you are hitchhiking in the weekends, as many people don't travel that far during weekdays. However, hitchhiking along the road towards Gdansk is very doable.
Direction Swinoujscie and Koszalin, Gda√Ö‚Äûsk. Slip road on the motorway A6 junction with small lay-by.
cars have to stop at traffic lights but otherwise they are going very fast. best to have a sign because road splits here.
In direction of Warszawa. Next to a gaz station. Take a bus (503 I believe) from the middle center and walk 5min; I have waited 15min maybe.

Traffic lights, zebra crossing, bus stop makes it a good spot towards JAROSLAW and RZESZOW. We (2 boys) waited 35min to get a ride to RZESZOW in summer morning. But there was much more traffic in the late afternoon day before, though.

Of course, it's better to hitch on the northern end of the ringroad if you want to go towards RZESZOW, but we slept about 300m from this spot and decided to try here. It's also closer from the city center than the northern end.
Bus stop. It took us (2 boys) 25min to hitch a ride towards PRZEMY≈öL. It was summer, late afternoon. It's in the middle of a village, so cars go slow.
I hitchhiked from here to Pyrzowice. This spot is good to get to Zabrze, Bytom and further in that direction.
Express road entrance towards A1.
Spot after the roundabout inbound Jelenia Gora.
Northbound.

Spot on the other side of the road (direction: Katowice/Wroc≈Çaw), can't put it right. It is a good place as this spot is located after traffic lights and on the bus stop - enough place to stop a car, good visibility. We catch there car to ≈Å√≥d≈∫.
small creek at the roundabout, nice place in Cieszyn direction
gas station, pretty good place for waiting

Good place to get lift to Kielce, Krak√≥w, Katowice. There is a pedestrain crossing (without lights, but good visibility) and a small sandy shoulder, good to stop. Take a card with direction you are going to. We found a lift just before darkness, very lucky :)
Don't give up, even if it's a very small city. Somebody will help you soon !
All the spot are very good, I just show this spot even if you're under the rain, here there is a bridge, it saved me.

Best place to Opole, Wroc≈Çaw. You can go to this place by bus in direction "≈Åojki" ("22" but I'm not sure) from the center. There is a lot of space. It's better to have a sign. To Opole about 10-15 min. If you want to get a ride to Wroc≈Çaw it takes about 25min. Don't accept a ride to Lubliniec.

Good spot for Katowice and Krak√≥w. Cars goes quite fast but there's a lot of space to stop. If you are going to Krak√≥w, you should have a sign (you can use "KRK". It works very good). If you are going to Katowice, sign is not necessary. 
You can get to this place by free bus to Auchan hipermarket.

Shell petrol station.

W kierunku A4, dobre pobocze, najlepsze pory ≈Çapania to 7 rano i 15 ze wzglƒôdu na ludzi doje≈ºd≈ºajƒÖcych do pracy.

take bus nr 21 or 37 to Bajeczna and then walk 450m further. This spot is just after the crossing, where the all truck join the road from bypass.

There is a bus stop and big roadside.
kierunek Wschowa, G≈Çog√≥w, ≈ªaga≈Ñ (DK 12); d≈Çugie szutrowe pobocze tu≈º przy lotnisku szybowcowym; dojazd z centrum autobusem nr 3, wysiadka na przystanku STRZY≈ªEWICE
it's easy to get from this spot to the A4 entry in Krapkowice. there is not much space for cars to stop but i've never had any problems to get a ride from this spot.
After roundabout small place to stop direction east. Direction west there is a busstop 1 km west from this point.

Somewhere there's a Petrol station area here on this road so if your driver goes into Gliwice or you are on the A4 instead of the A1 this is a good spot for going to the South :)

to Poznan, Germany, A2. A good place to stop a car.

From the city center, walk trough the Rybnicka street. You can stay in the front of BP petrol station. A lot of local traffic, but some of the cars are going to the A4 (Katowice, Krak√≥w or Opole, Wroc≈Çaw) or southwards to the Rybnik, Bohum√≠n, Ostrava and farther to the Czech republic)

to Bialystok

it's really good place to start hichhiking out of Slupsk , direction to Poznan , you can take bus no 5 from the center , leave on the last stop , and then hike about 1/1,5 km best regards , good luck

direction: Lviv, standing just outside the town a bit of traffic heads towards Ukraine maybe 30mins wait

any place on this road is good to hitchhike out of the 'gdansk gdynia sopot / tricity-area' in western direction. there is a lot of cars only commuting (meaning: driving around locally) so ask before how far someone can take you. on my personal rating from 1 to 10 (1 = poor, 10 = excellent) i want to give this place a '7'.

Towards Dabie, good location, especially when trains stop the traffic, waited here, there was sort of a shoulder, took me 30 minutes but it was early in the morning, not too many cars

from this traffic light you have a good chance to get a ride to SLUPSK as well as KOSZALIN. the light often signals 'red' for highway number 6 so all cars have to stop. there is heavy traffic on this road but if you build a cardboard-sign many drivers get in contact with you visually (they make sings with their hands). there is also a supermarket only 200 meters north of here if you feel hungry. on my personal scale from 1 to 10 (1 = poor, 10 = excellent) i want to rate this spot an '8'.

i had to walk from the nearest road through empty field and climb the highway fence to get to tool booths for cars/trucks and there i waited for an truck to stop, i had sign to ≈Å√≥d≈∫ but he took me throuh all of poland basically so maybe try Gliwice or something like that to catch one ride. This is not the best spot but somehow I managed to get a trail to the German border)))

bad place but good traffic, maybe u will have good luck
